thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The Biggest Banks Are Gobbling Up Deposits. Here’s Who’s Not

author: Christina Rexrode
title: The Biggest Banks Are Gobbling Up Deposits. Here’s Who’s Not
text:
Last year, businesses started pulling money from their bank accounts at Fifth Third Bancorp.
In response, the Cincinnati lender started offering higher interest rates to some consumers. But the bank still ended 2017 with slightly fewer deposits, the first drop in seven years.
Welcome to the new world of Main Street banking, where deposits...
